document_data.name: Spell Gem
document_data.Description: The function of such gems were to store single [[spell]]s. Specific types of gems could store more powerful spells. Unlike typical spells or [[scroll]]s, anyone could cast a spell stored in a ''spell gem''. However, the more powerful the spell stored was, the more difficult it was to cast it. The whole creation process was kept secret by the svirfnebli.
document_data.Variations:
There were several types of gems that could store spells. In order of the power of spells they could store, the gems were:
* [[Obsidian]] ([[cantrip]]s only)
* [[Lapis lazuli]]
* [[Quartz]]
* [[Bloodstone]]
* [[Amber]]
* [[Jade]]
* [[Topaz]]
* [[Star ruby]]
* [[Ruby]]
* [[Diamond]]
